sentence: When Florida Governor Ron DeSantis signed the Parental Rights in Education bill into law on March 28, Disney issued a statement saying it "should never have passed" and said that it should be repealed.
title: UPDATE 2-Disney's corporate affairs head, Morrell, to leave company

author: Mia Jankowicz
title: Gavin Newsom delivers scorching criticism of Democrats' response to protecting Roe v. Wade: 'Where the hell's my party?'
Column: Is Gavin Newsom running for president? No, it just sounds like it

author: Hannah Bleau
title: Warning Shot: DeSantis Plans to Use Funds to Bus Illegal Immigrants Dumped in Florida to Bidens Delaware

sentence: In March, Florida Governor Ron DeSantis (R) signed into law the Parental Rights in Education bill, which prohibits teachers from discussing sexuality and transgender ideology to children in kindergarten through third grade.
author: Alana Mastrangelo
title: CA Charter School Touts Proud Queer Asian-Latinx Educator Teaching Complexities of Intersectionality to 5-Year-Olds
